basics.name: Pablo Diego Pereira
basics.label: Economist
basics.summary: Economist, with extensive experience in the financial market, focusing on building investment fund portfolios and long and short operations. He has previous experience in back office, monitoring activity flows and team leadership.

work.name: Meta Investimentos
work.summary: Investment Advisor for over 5 years, offering expert guidance and personalized financial strategies to clients, solidifying my expertise in the financial market.

work.name: Meta&Actio Investimentos
work.summary: During my time as an Investment Advisor at Meta&Actio Investimentos, I honed my skills in analytical thinking, process management, portifolio building and investment planning, monitoring activity flows and working as a team leader.

work.name: Espaço Champs Elysees
work.summary: As the owner at Espaço Champs Elysees, I contributed to the organization's success with a focus on customer service and satisfaction, while also gaining valuable experience in leadership and team management.

work.name: Institute of Economics at Federal University of Rio de Janeiro
work.position: Intern Research Assistant at Economics Inovation Group
work.summary: As an Intern Research Assistant at the Federal University of Rio de Janeiro, I utilized my data management skills and worked with Google Sheet, Google Form and Google Docs for research support as the group where working on a international research project about the Brazilian technology, information, and communication (TIC) sector, focusing on the factors influencing the creation of new businesses within the Brazilian TIC sector, shedding light on the pivotal role of individual entrepreneurial traits, socio-cultural context, and access to information and knowledge, while also revealing challenges in access to funding, internationalization, and government support. With insights from 76 valid responses, this research underscores the significance of individual attributes in the entrepreneurial decision-making process, ultimately presenting a comprehensive analysis of the sector's dynamics.

volunteer.organization: AIESEC- Association Internationale des Étudiants en Sciences Économiques et Commerciales
volunteer.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
volunteer.summary: During my 1-year and 10-month tenure at AIESEC, I actively contributed to marketing and communications initiatives, implementing the use of cloud documents through Google Spreadsheet and Google Docs, and better understanding the needs and demands of exchange students and members with Google Forms, honing my skills in outreach and engagement within this global youth organization.

As a Marketing and Communications Consultant, I dedicated 9 months to Ayra Consultoria, gaining valuable problem solving experience and participating in various projects, wich the main one was the own company Marketing Plan

publications.name: [PT-BR]Cryptocurrencies: are these viable forms of money?
publications.publisher: Institute of Economics at Federal University of Rio de Janeiro
publications.summary: The present work aims to present an introduction to the study of cryptocurrencies, focusing on Bitcoin, the first cryptocurrency created. The basic concepts of cryptography, the technology behind cryptocurrencies, and the functioning of Bitcoin will be presented. The main challenges faced by Bitcoin and the main criticisms made to it will also be presented.

publications.name: [PT-BR]Cryptocurrencies – Viable Forms Of Money? A Brief Analysis Of The Characteristics And Functions Of Currency Compared To Electronic Currencies
publications.publisher: [PT-BR]VIII Federal University of Rio de Janeiro Academic Integration Week
publications.summary: In recent years, technological advancements have significantly impacted society, exemplified by the proliferation of smartphones and the emergence of electronic currencies, with Bitcoin being the most prominent. These cryptocurrencies, based on encryption, have evolved into financial assets with over a $100 billion market capitalization in just nine years, blurring the lines between traditional currencies and investment instruments.

publications.name: [PT-BR]Entrepreneurial Attitude Paradigms: An Analysis of the Elements that Facilitate the Creation of New ICT Businesses in Brazil
publications.publisher: [PT-BR]XXXIV Giulio Massarani Journey of Scientific, Artistic and Cultural Initiation - Federal University of Rio de Janeiro
publications.summary: In the evolving landscape of the post-Fordist era and the rise of the knowledge society, the Brazilian technology, information, and communication (TIC) sector is witnessing growth opportunities fueled by an expanding middle class and increasing digital inclusion. This study delves into the factors influencing the creation of new businesses within the Brazilian TIC sector, shedding light on the pivotal role of individual entrepreneurial traits, socio-cultural context, and access to information and knowledge, while also revealing challenges in access to funding, internationalization, and government support. With insights from 76 valid responses, this research underscores the significance of individual attributes in the entrepreneurial decision-making process, ultimately presenting a comprehensive analysis of the sector's dynamics.
